titleStmt.title: Heire begynnis the traitie of Orpheus kyng and how he yeid to hewyn: to hel to seik his quene and ane othir ballad in the lattir end.
titleStmt.author: Henryson, Robert, 1430?-1506?

notesStmt.note: Chepman's device (McKerrow 29) on title page and Myllar's device (McKerrow 22) at end.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
